name: Direct links out
description: Removes all "You are leaving our site" and redirection stuff from links.

description: Turn plain text URLs into links.

description: Disable link dragging and select text.

name: Show and reload broken images
description: Show and reload broken images, even when it contains "alt" tag.

name: Show Password onMouseOver
description: Show password when mouseover on password field.

name: URL Shortener Unshortener
description: Adds small button next to shortened URLs that will replace the shortened URLs with their real locations and vice-versa. Useful for when you don't want to blindly click links.

name: Anti-Adblock Killer
description: Bypasses anti-adblock functionality in websites.

name: AntiAdware
description: Remove forced download accelerators, managers, and adware on supported websites.

name: AdsBypasser
description: Bypass Ads, Popups and count-down ads.

name: BraveGPT
description: Display ChatGPT answers in Brave Search sidebar (powered by GPT-4!)

name: ChatGPT Auto-Continue
description: Automatically continue generating multiple ChatGPT responses.

name: ChatGPT Auto Refresh
description: Auto-sends background requests to keep sessions fresh & prevent Cloudflare checks + network errors.

name: ChatGPT Infinity
description: Generate endless answers from all-knowing ChatGPT (in any language!)

name: ChatGPT Widescreen Mode
description: Adds Widescreen + Fullscreen modes to ChatGPT + Poe.

name: Autoclear ChatGPT History
description: Auto-clears chat history when visiting chat.openai.com for maximum privacy.

name: BraveGPT
description: Display ChatGPT answers in Brave Search sidebar (powered by GPT-4!)

description: Add a Dabblet link to Gists saved from Dabblet.

name: GitHub Commit Whitespace
description: Adds button to hide whitespace diffs from commits.

name: GitHub Custom Emojis
description: Add custom emojis anywhere on GitHub.

name: GitHub Dark Script
description: Apply the GitHub-Dark style to the site.

name: GitHub Diff File Toggle
description: Add a toggle to each diff file (shift-click toggles all files).

name: GitHub Image Viewer
description: Preview images from within the file listing.

name: GitHub Make Tooltips
description: Convert all titles into GitHub tooltips.

name: GitHub Monospace Editor
description: Provide MonoSpace font on GitHub textareas.

name: GitHub PR Approvals
description: Require approvals in GitHub PRs before merging is allowed.

name: GitHub Toggle Code Wrap
description: Toggle code wrapping in files.

name: GitHub User Info
description: Show user information on avatar hover.

name: GitHub code colors
description: Add a color swatch preview to code.

name: GitHub code folding
description: Add code folding to files.

name: GitHub code guides
description: Add code guides to files and diffs.

name: GitHub code show whitespace
description: Show whitespace (spaces/tabs/carriage returns) in files.

name: GitHub collapse in comment
description: Toggle long code blocks in comments.

name: GitHub collapse markdown
description: Toggle markdown headers.

name: GitHub custom hotkeys
description: Add your own custom hotkeys to all of GitHub.

name: GitHub custom navigation
description: Add a custom navigation bar to link anywhere.

name: GitHub diff files filter
description: Add a file type filter to diffs.

name: GitHub diff links
description: Add next and previous buttons to each diff file.

name: GitHub font preview
description: Preview OTF, TTF and WOFF font files.

name: GitHub image preview
description: Add an image preview mode.

name: GitHub indent comments
description: Use the tab key in comments.

name: GitHub issue comments
description: Toggle the view of some issue comments and timeline entries.

name: GitHub issue counts
description: Show the number of issues in repository view.

name: GitHub issue highlighter
description: Highlight the linked issue.

name: GitHub label color picker
description: Add an extensive color picker to the label editor.

name: GitHub monospace font toggle
description: Add a monospace font toggle to comments.

name: GitHub remove diff signs
description: Remove diff signs from file diffs.

name: GitHub rtl comments
description: Add right-to-left indicators in comments.

name: GitHub search autocomplete
description: Add a search filter autocomplete to all of GitHub.

name: GitHub sort content
description: Sort lists and tables on GitHub.

name: GitHub static time
description: Convert time ago into a time format of your choice.

name: GitHub table of contents
description: Show a TOC window for Readme and wiki pages.

name: GitHub title notification
description: Add a notification indicator to browser tabs.

name: GitHub toggle expanders
description: Expand or collapse all commit titles.

name: GitHub toggle wiki sidebar
description: Toggle wiki sidebar view.

name: GitHub Commit Diff
description: Adds button to show diff (or patch) file for commit.

name: GitHub News Feed Filter
description: Add filters for Github homepage news feed items.

name: GitHub Pages Linker
description: Add a link to Github Pages (gh-pages) when available.

name: GitHub Pull Request From Link
description: Make pull request branches linkable.

name: GitHub Reply Comments
description: Easy reply to Github comments.

name: GitHub Skip Delete Repo Verification
description: Skips the verification step when deleting a repository.

name: GitHub Star History
description: Adds star history chart to every repo's sidebar.

name: Endless Google
description: Load more results automatically and endlessly.

name: GoogleGPT
description: Display ChatGPT answers in Google Search sidebar (powered by GPT-4!)

name: Google Images direct link
description: Adds direct links to images and pages in google image search.

name: Google Translate Keyboard Shortcut
description: Adds keyboard shortcut for quick swapping between active languages.

name: Reddit Search On Google
description: Adds a button to your Google searches to show only Reddit posts.

name: Handy Image
description: Displays the full size image for many image hosting websites, skipping popups and other annoying stuff.

name: Image Max URL
description: Finds larger or original versions of images/videos for thousands of supported websites, including a customizable image popup feature.

name: Mouseover Popup Image Viewer
description: (Deprecated) Shows images and videos behind links and thumbnails.

description: Powerful picture viewing tool which can popup/scale/rotate/batch save pictures automatically.

description: Auto-clears chat history when visiting chat.openai.com for maximum privacy.

name: Remove Google Click Tracking
description: Removes Google's click-tracking from result links.

name: Remove Yandex Redirect
description: Removes Yandex's click-tracking from result links.

name: Hide YouTube recommendations
description: Hides the thumbnails and titles of the recommended videos to reduce distraction and procrastination.

name: Iridium
description: Adds a lot of extra functionality to YouTube, including pop-out videos, extra control over video/comment feeds, and much more.

name: YouTube Classic
description: Reverts YouTube to its classic design (unround corners, restore dislikes + remove/redirect Shorts).

name: YouTube Peek Preview
description: See video thumbnails, ratings and other details when you mouse over a Youtube link from almost any website.

name: YouTube Subtitle Download
description: Adds links to download video subtitles.

description: How to create simple Userscripts and installing it using Greasemonkey.
